# 🧾 Qualitative Research Methods

This section introduces qualitative research methods relevant to nutrition, public health, and sensory science.

Students will explore when and how to apply qualitative techniques, how to collect and analyse textual data, and how to combine these approaches with quantitative insights.

---

## 📚 Notebooks

- [01 – Introduction to Qualitative Research](01_intro_qualitative.ipynb)
- [02 – Data Collection Methods](02_data_collection.ipynb)
- [03 – Coding and Thematic Analysis](03_thematic_analysis.ipynb)
- [04 – Simple Text Analysis in Python](04_text_analysis_python.ipynb)

---

## 🎯 Learning Outcomes

- Understand when and how to use qualitative methods
- Compare qualitative and quantitative research
- Conduct thematic analysis using manual and digital tools
- Perform basic text analysis and sentiment extraction in Python

---

## 🔍 Tools Introduced

- Manual coding frameworks
- Taguette, RQDA, NVivo (overview)
- Python tools for NLP (e.g. NLTK, TextBlob)
